title: Bloomberg Markets: Nierengarten on Small, Mid-Market Biotech

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: David Nierengarten Head of Health Care Equity Research Wedbush Securities Discussing investing in biotech stocks, inlcuding Blueprint Medicines.
